decks.notes: This Gruul Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. The key strategy is to establish board presence early with creatures like Outcaster Trailblazer and Trumpeting Carnosaur, while using burn spells like Volcanic Spite and Obliterating Bolt to control the board and deal direct damage to the opponent. Cards like Terror of the Peaks and Calamity, Galloping Inferno provide additional reach and finishers. The mana base is optimized for consistent early game plays and ensuring the deck can reliably cast its spells.

This Orzhov Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming opponents with a mix of aggressive creatures and disruption spells. Zoraline, Cosmos Caller and Preacher of the Schism provide early pressure, while Caustic Bronco and Deep-Cavern Bat disrupt opponent's plans. Liliana of the Veil and Aclazotz, Deepest Betrayal offer additional disruption options. The deck aims to control the board early and maintain a relentless assault to secure a quick victory. Restless Fortress and Concealed Courtyard help ensure a smooth mana curve for consistent aggression.
